page.title: 04BADBURY RINGS-NATURE
page.content: {NATURE-BADBURY RINGS } The grassy area is rich with herbs and many botanists like to visit it. In the centre of{BADBURY RINGS}there is a small wooded area, which has fairly recently been cleared of weeds and scrub. The wood was planted in 1761 by the {Bankes Family}it is mainly{scots pines}with{oak trees {around}the edge. When the trees die new trees will have to be planted in exactly the same pattern to the original plan. Apart from the {scots pines}and {oak trees}in the middle of the Rings we can also see other types of trees called the {Viburnum }( a wayfaring tree,){Hawthorn,Blackthorn}(another way of saying Sloe Bush){Wild Rose {,Brambles ,Wild Pivet}and{Ash Trees. { }
